column6: Under attack by the horrors of the Deadlands, the villains learn that only way to survive is to sell their souls to the Devil... Magneto has always hated everything about the Red Skull, but would he betray that to gain his freedom? Rising stars Joshua Williamson and Luca Pizzari continue their tale of bloody revenge across all of Battleworld!
column8: | artist:Luca Pizzari | penciller (cover):Riley Rossmo | writer:Josh Williamson
